Renato Braghiere is a Research Scientist at Caltech and affiliate to NASA Jet Propulsion Lab. He works on climate modeling and the global carbon cycle.

## Education

- [PhD in Atmosphere, Oceans and Climate]{.fw-bold} | University of Reading, United Kingdom | 2013 -  2018
- [MSc in Atmospheric Sciences]{.fw-bold} | University of Sao Paulo, Brazil | 2011 -  2013
- [BSc in Meteorology]{.fw-bold} | University of Sao Paulo, Brazil | 2007 -  2010

## Professional Experience

- [2022-present:]{.fw-bold} Research Scientist, 	Caltech 
- [2019-2022:]{.fw-bold} 	Postdoc at NASA JPL
